15.title: Episode #4.15
15.plot: A prime time historical Turkish soap opera television series. It was originally broadcast on Show TV and then transferred to Star TV. It is based on the life of Suleiman the Magnificent, the longest reigning Sultan of the Ottoman Empire, and his wife Hürrem Sultan, a slave girl who became Sultana.

1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Suleiman accedes the throne and becomes the Ottoman Empire's newest Sultan. Slave girl Alexandra is being transported across the Black Sea to Istanbul to join the Sultan's harem.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Alexandra prepares for her first visit to Sultan Suleiman's chambers. Suleiman sends an envoy to Hungary and the seeds of a forbidden love begin to take root in the palace.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Suleiman sends an ambassador to the Hungarian King who sends an unexpected gift in return. Mahidevran falls sick and the palace doctor reveals surprising news. Hurrem's battles with Mahidevran become physical.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Hurrem is seriously injured in her fight with Mahidevran and repercussions are felt throughout the palace. Angry with King Ladislas, Suleiman sends troops to take Belgrade. The love between Abraham and Hatice continues to grow.

5.title: Episode #1.5

9.title: Episode #1.9

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: As he prepares to invade the island of Rhodes in 1522, Suleiman is still displeased with his concubine Hurrem; Hatice continues to brood over her betrothal to Piri Pasha's son, since she is in love with Ibrahim. Siege of Rhodes ends.

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: Suleiman survives assassination attempt thanks to Pargali. Hurrem delivers a baby girl. Hatice's fiancee falls sick. At the end Suleiman discovers love letter of Ibrahim and has him brought to his presence.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: Hatice's fiancee has tuberculosis and the engagement is postponed. Ibrahim asks permission to go visit his family in Parga, Greece. Mahidevran and Hurrem vie to sleep with Suleiman next.

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: Ibrahim visits with his family in Greece but is soon recalled home by Suleiman. Hatice's love for Ibrahim is revealed to Valide Sultana by Hurrem, who is later accused of the murder of a concubine who insulted her.

14.title: Episode #1.14
14.plot: Investigation in the murder of a concubine continues. Hurrem as the main suspect is finally removed from the palace under Suleiman's orders. Two Pashas are demoted. Ibrahim visits Hurrem in order to make her an offer she cannot refuse.

15.title: Episode #1.15
15.plot: Hurrem suffers in her banishment. Leo, Hurrem's former love shows up in town. Hatice's engagement party takes place in the palace's garden. Hurrem accepts Ibrahim offer and returns home. Sedika is sent to Suleyman's room by Valide.

16.title: Episode #1.16
16.plot: Sadika survives an attempted rape by her co-conspirator, who is then beheaded. Mehmet almost drowns in a pool. Hurrem is pregnant again. Leo is recruited to paint Suleyman's portrait, but Hurrem has still not seen his face.

17.title: Episode #1.17
17.plot: Hurrem delivers a third child, Selim (who will become the Sultan upon Suleiman's death). Mustafa all of a sudden is eight years old later. Master Leo is finally brought in Hurrem's presence and the two see each other.

18.title: Episode #1.18
18.plot: Ibrahim is sent to Egypt to quell a rebellion. Hatice finds out she is pregnant. Hurrem maneuvers to inhabit Hatice's former room to spite Mahidervan. Hurrem manages to talk to Leo. Nigar Kalfa is attacked.

19.title: Episode #1.19
19.plot: Nigar Kalfa is forced to spy on Hurrem. Ahmet Pasha's short term rebellion is brought to an end. Hurrem loses the ring Suleyman gave her. The Janissaries rebel against their Ruler while he is hunting in Edirne. Hatice takes a bad fall.

20.title: Episode #1.20
20.plot: The Janissaries rebellion comes to an end and the leaders are beheaded. Hatice loses her baby after a fall. Nigar Kalfa discovers that Leo has feelings for Hurrem. Suleyman make a move on Sadika.

21.title: Episode #1.21
21.plot: Hurrem finds out Suleyman slept with Sadika. Nigar Kalfa is bossed by the two Sultana. One day she confides in Ibrahim Pasha and tries to kiss him, but he sternly rebuffs her. Ferhat Pasha, Suleyman's brother in law, is sentenced to death.

22.title: Episode #1.22
22.plot: Hurrem prevails over Suleyman to send away the Russian "gifts." Leo is still longing for Hurrem. Ibrahim has a premonition about his fate. Gulsah goes on a murder mission.

23.title: Episode #1.23
23.plot: Gulsah is severely beaten by Mahidervan for her murderous attempt. Hurrem fears for her life and Mahidervan is growing sad as Suleyman continues to to ignore her. Leo's letter to Hurrem is intercepted by Ibrahim. Gritti, the son of the Venetian Doge, grows in importance at the court.

24.title: Episode #1.24
24.plot: Ibrahim has Leo arrested and threatens Hurrem to reveal her love story to Suleiman, giving her suicide as the only way out. Sadika attempts to kill the Sultan.

1.title: Episode #2.1
1.plot: Viktoria's attempt to kill Suleiman, the Magnificent, fails, so does Ibrahim's attempt to get rid of Hürrem Sultan and Leo after learning of their former connection in the Ukraine. The murder attempt on Sultan Suleiman alloys his relationship to Ibrahim.

2.title: Episode #2.2
2.plot: Hürrem Sultan can save herself and starts threatening Ibrahim while also talking ill of him to her husband the Sultan. Sultan Suleiman in the meantime sets out to take over Hungary and once again becomes the goal of an attempted murder, this time by Layos' men, who are afraid of Sultan Suleiman's predominance. Hatice Sultan learns that she is pregnant again but fears a miscarriage and is persuaded by Hürrem Sultan to see a spiritual.

3.title: Episode #2.3
3.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

4.title: Episode #2.4
4.plot: Hurrem hires a medium to cast a deadly spell on Ibrahim. Princess Isabella is getting Suleyman's attention. The statues gifted to Ibrahim by the sultan are a cause of scandal for some people.

5.title: Episode #2.5
5.plot: Hurrem saves Ibrahim's baby at birth. This does not reduce tension between the two, who keep hating each other. Suleyman continues to vie for Isabella's admiration. The Bey is in love with a mysterious girl.

6.title: Episode #2.6
6.plot: Ibrahim reveals to Hurem that the woman in the hunting lodge is Sultan's special guest. Hurrem suspects that Sultan has a relationship with the princess. Hatice's baby gets sick and Hurem fears it is caused by the poisoned diary of Ibrahim's . Finally the fever goes down. Everyone rejoices. Prince Frederick tried to enter secretly into the hunting lodge in order to save his fiancee, Princess Isabella. The guards arrests the prince. Frederick confesses to Ibrahim that Griti informed him were the princess was located and they arrest him. Ibrahim gets angry when he ...

7.title: Episode #2.7
7.plot: Ibrahim quells a Shi'ite rebellion led by Kalender Celebi (1527) and returns home. Suleyman at last makes a move on Isabella, whose fiancee was released after ambassadors paid a ransom.

8.title: Episode #2.8
8.plot: Bali Bey kidnapps Armin and hides her in Matrakci's palace. When her father looks for her, Matrakci lies him that Armin is not there. Armin's father complains to Ibrahim Pasha. Isabella feels embarrassed after Sultan kisses her. Sultan gives a maid necklace to Isabella. The princess initially rejects it, but then wants to wear, when Hurem sees the necklace, thinking it was made for her. Hurem gets angry and threatens Isabella. Meanwhile, Ibrahim has been exposed to toxins from his diary and now is seriously ill.

9.title: Episode #2.9
9.plot: Armin decides to return to her father, so as not to cause problems to Bali Bey. Hurem gives a gift to Isabella, with a snake in a box. Frederick is aware of Isabella actually being alive and sends a letter to Isabella. Hurem visits Valide and accuses her of disrespecting her, even if she bore three heirs to Sultan. Valide replies that her son has his own harem, not one woman only. After Hurem is asked by Valide to vacate her royal chambers. When Sultan visits the princess Hurem's gifted snake appears and bites Isabella.

10.title: Episode #2.10
10.plot: Sultan manages to save the princess after the snake bite. He also brings his personal physician to examine what has happened to Ibrahim Pasha. The physician tells that Ibrahim had been exposed to a deadly poison, but manages to save him. Ibrahim transmits the poison from his diary to his baby. When Hatice falls asleep with the baby, the next day the baby is found dead. Ibrahim accuses Hurem of poisoning his son and him and threatens to expose her past relationship with Luca to Sultan. He brings the painting of Hurem painted by Luca and his diary to Sultan.

11.title: Episode #2.11
11.plot: Suleyman does not understand the language of the Crimea and urges Hurem to read out the contents of the diary. Hurem feels cornered and fabricates the contents of the diary. In the meantime Sumbul Aga comes forth and informs that Hatice tried to commit suicide. Whilst Sultan and Ibrahim run out, Hurem tries to get rid of the diary and throws it in the garden. Gulsa finds it and gives it to Mahidevran, who tries to find out what is written with Nigar Kalfa's help. Sultan asks Hurem to explain the contents of the diary belonged to Luca. Hurem tells that it was just a ...

12.title: Episode #2.12
12.plot: Ibrahim manages to prevent the escape of Isabella and he knows that this was the plan of Hurem. Hurem feels happy thinking that Princess Isabella has gone from the palace and gives Gul Aga gold to organise celebration with a dance party in the harem, however, Valide stops all celebrations. After several days of seclusion, Hatice asks Valide to return to the palace because she misses Ibrahim. Both decide to forget the past and try to start a new life and then prepare dinner for the royal family. During the dinner Hurem is shocked to see Isabella there. Later they argue...

13.title: Episode #2.13
13.plot: Hurrem sees Valide welcoming Isabella in the harem and is shocked. She goes to Sultan's office and argues with him. Isabella is not happy with her room and wants to stay with Sultan. The competition for Sultan's attention starts between Isabella and Hurem.

imdb.plot outline: At the age of 26, when his reign began, Sultan Süleyman sought to build an empire more powerful than Alexander the Great and to render the Ottomans invincible. Throughout his 46-year reign, his fame as the greatest warrior and ruler of his age spreads both to the East and West. With his companion Pargali Ibrahim, Süleyman achieves great victories, and makes his name known in the Muslim World. Süleyman called Ibrahim his brother, friend and advisor. The television series shows Süleyman's consolidation of his power: Pargali Ibrahim being grand minister of state, reinforcing the rule of law throughout the empire, meeting foreign diplomats, and preparing for military campaigns, all set against the backdrop of the tension between Christian Europe and the Ottoman Empire. The series also focuses on the relationships among the members of the imperial household, especially romantic entanglements and rivalries. The animosity between Hürrem Sultan and Mahidevran Sultan, mother of the Sultan's eldest son, and the role of Hafsa Sultan, the valide sultan; Hürrem's rise as Süleyman's favorite while pregnant with his son, her falling from favor several times and her eventual return to grace; Pargali Ibrahim's entanglement with Hatice Sultan, the Sultan's sister, and many others.
imdb.title: Magnificent Century
plot: From 1520, follows Suleiman the Magnificent and his relatives from his great conquests to the "Battle of Szigeth".::Mislav Repinac

At the age of 26, when his reign began, Sultan Süleyman sought to build an empire more powerful than Alexander the Great and to render the Ottomans invincible. Throughout his 46-year reign, his fame as the greatest warrior and ruler of his age spreads both to the East and West. With his companion Pargali Ibrahim, Süleyman achieves great victories, and makes his name known in the Muslim World. Süleyman called Ibrahim his brother, friend and advisor. The television series shows Süleyman's consolidation of his power: Pargali Ibrahim being grand minister of state, reinforcing the rule of law throughout the empire, meeting foreign diplomats, and preparing for military campaigns, all set against the backdrop of the tension between Christian Europe and the Ottoman Empire. The series also focuses on the relationships among the members of the imperial household, especially romantic entanglements and rivalries. The animosity between Hürrem Sultan and Mahidevran Sultan, mother of the Sultan's eldest son, and the role of Hafsa Sultan, the valide sultan; Hürrem's rise as Süleyman's favorite while pregnant with his son, her falling from favor several times and her eventual return to grace; Pargali Ibrahim's entanglement with Hatice Sultan, the Sultan's sister, and many others.::ahmetkozan
